q: Mr Andy Coulson quit as the paper's editor in 2007 saying he took ultimate responsibility for the scandal, but denied knowing about the phone hacking. In a statement, he said it had been a privilege and an honour to work for David Cameron for three-and-a-half years and he was proud of the work he had done. But he added: "Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for

. "There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do," he said. All sorts of nastiness. And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country. But with all of the cable channels and talk radio and blogs, especially blogs, where people can be anonymous with their nastiness, I think has caused a level of coarseness in our society that we've all got to think about. Colin Powell said he thought Barack Obama was making an effort to reach across political divides to tone down the rhetoric and urged members of Congress to do the same.

The news of the change rocked Silicon Valley, with analysts and company insiders offering varying theories. Some said Mr. Eric Schmidt was tired of the day-to-day hassles of management. Mr. Eric Schmidt said in the interview, I would tell you, frankly, a decade is a long time to be a C.E.O., and Larry will discover this. Others say Mr. Page always planned to re-assert his authority at some point. "Larry has wanted to be C.E.O., so that's not a surprise," said a former Google sales executive

President Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later. Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. the Commons culture committee, warned the prime minister now faced serious questions. "This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about," Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the prime minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp. "It's a mark of the man that he would sneak out a statement on a Friday morning on a busy news day. Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street- we need to get to the truth. His remarks were echoed by Chris Bryant, the former Labour Europe minister, who is seeking to sue the police over allegations that his phone was illegally hacked on behalf of the News of the World.

It is a difficult decision when you are putting a team around you. I also think it is important on show like this that you have people who are competitive with each other because essentially, the judges are taking part in this competition as well as the competitors. his first game since a two-game suspension for violating the NBA's steroid policy, had 14 points and seven rebounds for the Sixers. " Toni Kukoc gave us a big lift off the bench," Allen Iverson said. He made a whole lot of plays and took a lot of pressure of me to score. Phoenix, which trailed by 13 in the second half, cut it 91-88 on a layup and free throw by Cliff Robinson with 4:40 left in the game.
